strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All World Eaters Core and Elite formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the World Eaters Traitor Legion. The World Eaters cast away most of their long ranged weaponry to specialize in close combat as favored by their deity.

formations.name: World Eaters Retinue
formations.units: One Chaos Lord, four Khorne Berzerkers, four World Eaters Assault Marines, four World Eaters Rhinos, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Skullseeker Terminators
formations.units: One Chaos Lord, four Skullseeker Terminators, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Add up to two Mutilators: 50 points each

sections.name: World Eaters Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Chaos Space Marines
formations.units: Six Chaos Space Marines, three World Eaters Rhinos, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Replace three World Eaters Rhinos with three Chaos Land Raiders: 125 points

formations.name: Berzerker Bikes
formations.units: One Chaos Lord, six Khorne Berzerker Assault Bikes, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Juggernaut Riders
formations.units: One Chaos Lord, six Juggernaut Riders, Daemonic Pact

sections.name: World Eaters Support Formations
sections.description: Two Support formations may be taken per Core formation.

formations.name: Khorne Defiler Pack
extraUnits: Add up to three Slaughterfiends: 50 points each

sections.name: War Engines and Chaos Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: Greater Brass Scorpions
extraUnits: Add up to two Greater Brass Scorpions: 175 points each

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points.

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points. The first one is free.

upgrades.title: World Eaters Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Replace the Chaos Lord with a Warlord
Replace the Chaos Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Khorne
Replace four Chaos Rhinos with Dreadclaws
Replace four Chaos Rhinos with two Chaos Spartan Assault Tanks
Add two Chaos Spartan Assault Tanks

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Stalker
items.description: Add one Chaos Stalker to the formation

items.name: Champion
items.description: Add one Champion of Chaos character to the formation
